text:
I can help u out ..if u need ...
I can build the complete website
Just open the layouts where u need the new header or footer and swap with existing header nd footer sections.

U can change complete theme style or add new fields using field json
Theme override css is important so that u can further chnge theme css as per requirement.
When u open the theme u generated in the top right preview option from there u can chnge all setting
